title: The No Office Holiday Party
description: A holiday party for freelancers, creatives, WFHers, and everyone who doesn’t like socializing with their bosses. Features live-band karaoke, flash tattoos, raffle prizes, drink specials, dancing, and more.
cost: Free for New York Groove members at the “True Believer” and “Ace” levels; $10 for “Backer” level members.
